basics.name: Paul Osorio Schuler
basics.label: Principal Full Stack Engineer | .NET • Node.js • React
basics.summary: Hands-on Principal Full Stack Engineer with 12+ years of experience architecting and shipping scalable enterprise software. Expert in .NET, Node.js, and React, with a focus on distributed systems, cloud infrastructure (GCP/Azure), and Generative AI (Gemini/Vertex). Proven track record of generating $10M+ in business value through automation and leading technical execution for high-performance squads.

work.name: Chekalo.pe
highlights: Architected and developed a full-stack comparison engine using React Router v7 (Framework Mode), Node.js, and .NET, processing 500K+ products daily.
Engineered a high-precision ETL pipeline with Python and Airflow, utilizing Vertex Embeddings and Gemini 2.5 Flash in Batch Mode for cost-efficient semantic product matching.
Built a scalable data ingestion system with custom rate-limiting and rotating user-agents to bypass anti-bot protections, storing raw data in GCS Buckets
Designed a polyglot storage architecture using Qdrant (Vector DB), OpenSearch, and PostgreSQL on GCP, achieving sub-second search latency
Automated deployments using self-hosted GitHub Actions runners on GCP, reducing deployment cycles from hours to <5 minutes and eliminating manual operational overhead
Designed and shipped a high-performance frontend using TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, focusing on Core Web Vitals and seamless cross-device user experience

work.name: Scotiabank Perú
highlights: Engineering an event-driven ecosystem to modernize legacy workflows using Kafka and Camunda, improving system decoupling and scalability across the bank's automation infrastructure.
Leading technical execution and strategy for AI-driven solutions, leveraging .NET, AI Builder, and Microsoft Copilot Studio for document extraction and sentiment analysis.
Architecting and validating complex automation solutions, serving as the final technical escalation point for developers and tech leads to solve high-complexity bottlenecks.
Driving a >CAD 2M annual business impact by delivering full-stack automation initiatives focused on sales growth and financial risk mitigation.
Mentoring a high-performing engineering team and managing the end-to-end SDLC, aligning technical delivery with strategic OKRs and enterprise-level technical standards.
Spearheading the migration of RPA infrastructure and workflow orchestration platforms, evaluating technical feasibility and implementing security-first guidelines.

work.name: Banco de Crédito BCP
highlights: Led technical execution and architecture for 4 cross-functional squads (22+ members), overseeing full-stack delivery and enforcing high-quality engineering standards.
Delivered USD 8M in business value by engineering bank-wide automation solutions that drove significant revenue growth and operational cost avoidance.
Defined and implemented the CoE (Center of Excellence) governance model, establishing technical standards for security, performance, and enterprise-grade scalability.
Optimized a USD 2M technology budget, managing Azure/SaaS infrastructure and vendor contracts to ensure a high-performance, cost-effective tech stack.
Acted as the primary technical decision-maker, aligning software architecture with banking security standards and long-term scalability goals.

work.name: Scotiabank Perú
highlights: Pioneered automation for Scotiabank Latam by developing and deploying the region's first production robot using .NET and Pega Robotics, generating an immediate impact of USD 500K.
Led a high-performing engineering team of 9 to scale RPA initiatives bank-wide, overseeing a PEN 2.5M technology budget and technical delivery.
Engineered the RPA Governance Model, establishing the technical standards, security protocols, and development best practices for enterprise-grade scalability.
Developed and automated critical business processes, bridging the gap between legacy banking systems and modern automated workflows.
Drove a client-centric engineering culture, aligning automated solutions with measurable business value and operational efficiency.

work.name: Scotiabank Perú
work.summary: Developed, implemented, and deployed requirements for the system supporting the credit line approval and renewal workflow for the bank's Wholesale clients. Responsibilities included implementing new functionalities, as well as system maintenance and incident management.

work.name: Software Enterprise Services
work.summary: Provided maintenance for the bank's web application supporting the loan processing system.

work.name: MINEDU Peru
work.summary: Designed, developed, and implemented the nationwide student admission system for pedagogical institutes supported by MINEDU.

work.name: Software Enterprise Services
work.summary: Developed new functionalities for the bank's system supporting mortgage loans.

work.name: SISPRO S.A.C.
work.summary: Performed analysis, maintenance, and development of applications for BANBIF, including the integration of RENIEC's (National Registry of Identification and Civil Status) queuing system into an application for customer identification.
